1: Shared ancestral stories keep great deeds alive and strengthen people today.
2: Steady guidance establishes people and makes communities flourish.
3: Guiding light and favor secure lasting success and prosperity.
4: A just ruler brings rescue to communities.
5: Empowering presence ensures triumph over all opposition.
6: I trust higher power for victory.
7: Rescue and justice bring lasting honor
8: We continually praise goodness now and forever.
9: Guiding presence goes with efforts and brings honorable victory.
10: We advance and opponents retreat; we prosper and keep our goods.
11: Spreading among nations brings shared blessing and unity.
12: Treat every person as priceless, beyond price or profit.
13: Be honored and respected by neighbors all around.
14: Earn honor and a good reputation among all peoples.
15: Constant clarity and dignity fill every moment.
16: Use respectful speech and uphold justice with steadfast courage.
17: We remember and remain faithful to our covenant.
18: We keep steadfast hearts and walk the right path.
19: Guiding light carries through darkest valleys.
20: Stay devoted to the divine alone.
21: Inner truth stands revealed, nurturing clarity, integrity, and growth.
22: We stay devoted all day for a higher purpose
23: Enduring presence lifts and embraces all forever.
24: Attentive presence restores dignity and brings enduring freedom.
25: Deep humility cultivates resilience and steady renewal.
26: Mercy brings timely help and lasting renewal.
